author: The Great Barred Owl
text:
Money, like any limited resource, must be distributed with maximum coverage for maximum benefit. It is absolutely, empirically, objectively, true to say extreme wealth is the direct cause of extreme poverty. 

But good news: We could all agree to allow neither. #WealthIsBad https://t.co/0fAw0LfHe5

author: The Great Barred Owl
text: I got to be honest in every generation except maybe the first, there's always been at least one of the starters that I just didn't give a shit about. But this Gen 9 trio... I love them all! This will be the first time I genuinely have a hard time making a choice. #PokemonDay

author: The Great Barred Owl
text: I'm a little concerned about a cornerstone of @DrawfeeShow  programming: the pokémon episode. Why? Because these 3 new starters are perfect. They are all 101% perfection, how do we move on from here? What do we do? Uhoohhhh.

author: The Great Barred Owl
text: Am I super stressed out having to move by the end of the month and watching old @DrawfeeShow streams while I pack? Yes. Is "Bone-Henge" the most horrific phrase I've ever heard? Also yes. What if Bone Game but Stone Game? "Artists turn random object into a Henge."
